bard:HarmoniousVoice.NAME: Harmonious Voice
bard:HarmoniousVoice.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you queue a {Block Note} or {Buff Note} , gain !M! Temporary_HP.

bard:DiscordantVoice.NAME: Discordant Voice
bard:DiscordantVoice.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you queue a {Attack Note} or {Debuff Note} , deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

bard:BestowCurse.NAME: Bestow Curse
bard:BestowCurse.DESCRIPTION: Enemy takes !M! damage at the start of each of its turns.

bard:FeastOnFear.NAME: Feast on Fear
bard:FeastOnFear.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy is Vulnerable, gain !M! Temporary_HP instead.

bard:Thunderwave.NAME: Thunderwave
bard:Thunderwave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

bard:SongBolt.NAME: Song Bolt
bard:SongBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Note you have queued. NL Clear your Note queue.

bard:QuickSong.NAME: Quick Song
bard:QuickSong.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Queue Notes as if the card was played. NL Play a Melody.

bard:TinyHut.NAME: Tiny Hut
bard:TinyHut.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card for each {Block Note} you have queued.

bard:Gamble.NAME: Gamble
bard:Gamble.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card type (Attack/Skill/Power). NL Draw 1 card, if it is the chosen type, it costs 0 this turn.

bard:DervishDance.NAME: Dervish Dance
bard:DervishDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each {Attack Note} you have queued.

bard:Parry.NAME: Parry
bard:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Dexterity affects this card !M! times.

bard:Balestra.NAME: Balestra
bard:Balestra.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL This card's damage is affected by Dexterity instead of Strength.

bard:Invisibility.NAME: Invisibility
bard:Invisibility.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Draw !M! more card next turn. NL Exhaust.
bard:Invisibility.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Draw !M! more cards next turn. NL Exhaust.

bard:Advance.NAME: Advance
bard:Advance.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Lose [E] next turn.
